input.component: {request.customValue}

expected_behavior: Should fail or ignore - request scope should be read-only

error.message: Request scope is read-only. Cannot set 'request.customValue'

note: Request scope contains HTTP metadata (method, path, url) and should not be modifiable by components
design_note: This is intentional Quantum design. Unlike ColdFusion where the request scope is mutable and often used for passing data between templates, Quantum enforces request scope as read-only. This prevents side effects and makes component behavior more predictable. Components should use q:set with local or session scope for mutable state, and treat request scope purely as an immutable source of HTTP request metadata.
